name: Monster Loops
description: Binx Interactive is a game development studio from Zagreb, Croatia. Most of the team members started out as gamers, and their interest in the industry grew over time, until it turned into a passion for creating the things that they would love to play. The studio has been active since 2014, and their numerous projects are now coming to fruition.
developers: Mad Head Games d.o.o. Novi Sad
publishers: Mad Head Games d.o.o. Novi Sad
